name: Lim Chee Aun
summary: Product engineer and designer, focusing on front-end architecture, user interface design, user experience and product development.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.summary:
- Worked on internal tools and content management systems with Ember.js, Ember Model and Ember Data. Wrote integration tests using QUnit with Rosie.js for setting test data and Sinon.js for mocks and stubs.
- Designed a better user experience for power users in the CMS, with the goal of optimizing the workflow of internal operations.
- Worked on the first Chromecast V1 integration with the video player on the web site and the receiver.
- Worked on setting a basic and early prototype application for Apple TV, using TVML and TVJS.
- Involved in the team to implement a responsive website.

experiences.title: Senior Front-End Developer
experiences.summary:
- Worked on a lot of travel distribution partner sites, with integration of the search form, results listing interface and site widgets.
- Built a mobile-only website for Flights and Hotels, focusing on real-world performance, touch interaction and user experience on small-screen devices.
- Built a native Window 8 app for Hotels and Travel Deals, coded with web technologies (HTML/CSS/JS/
WinJS), fully optimized for touch tablets and desktops.
- Involved in the team to implement a responsive website, with strong focus on performance, responsive design for multiple screen sizes, and full localization for over 30 languages including RTL (right-to-left) languages.
